Text.Text: Basic residences of the soldiers. Group of tents where soldiers sleep and gather.
Upgraded and more advanced residences of soldiers.
Place where all military personnel gathers to eat.
Canteen need for all military personnel
Small warehouse which boosts surrounding production buildings. Replaces normal workforce with military workforce.
Gigantic warehouse which boosts surrounding production buildings. Replaces normal workforce with military workforce.
Central military building where everything starts for the military personnel.
Military Headquarters need for all military personnel.
Reduce consumption of consumption goods for military personnel.
Reduce consumption of weapons for military personnel.

Producing cigarettes from paper and hops.
Unhealthy but loved by military personnel.
Producing Military Uniforms from wool and iron.
Keeping the military personnel warm in the winter and well, not so cool in the summer.
Producing Sleeping Bag from wool, cotton fabric and fur.
Gathering place for military personnel to do leisure activities. Gives buffs to the military personnel based on the input good.
Recreation Centre need for all military personnel.
Building that provides the public service need for military personnel. Also provides global buffs.
Military Academy need for military personnel.
Build this module to be able to slot items from the itemsets.

Reduce consumption of mail for all military and non-military residences
Reduce consumption of mail for all military and non-military residences.
Open pit where Iron ore is excavated. All work is done by soldiers workforce.
Open pit where Coal ore is excavated. All work is done by soldiers workforce.
Secret blueprints of the scary Pirate Naval Architect.

Anne's best friend from the sky.
A set of pirate repair tools.
You can never get pass this pirate taxman without paying your part.
A chest full of plundered treasures.
Jean's pidgeon that brings the most secret pirate messages.
Producing cardgames from paper, wood and quartz sand.
The best time to pass some sparetime.
Public service for soldiers where they train and learn how to shoot.
Public service for soldiers where they train and learn how to shoot.
Public service for soldiers where they train and learn how to shoot.
Multifactory producing Basic Ammunition and Bombs based on recipe list
Recipelist for the Ammunition factory producing Basic Ammunition and Bombs.
Basic Ammunition used by military force
Recipe for the Basic Ammunition factory producing Basic Ammunition.
Recipe for the Bombs Ammunition factory producing Bombs Ammunition.
Noble friends from the military officers
No Basic Ammunition is provided. Make an ammunition depot in the surroundings to provide Basic Ammunition to this building.
Providing Basic Ammunition to the defense buildings so they can actually work.
Centralised depot for Basic Ammunition to provide the ammunition to the defense buildings to make sure they can actually shoot.
James has plans to improve cigarettes. Why use hopps if you can use tabacco to improve the quality.
Shell Ammunition used by military force
Recipe for the Shell Ammunition factory producing Shell Ammunition.
No Shell Ammunition is provided. Make an ammunition depot in the surroundings to provide Shell Ammunition to this building.
Providing Shell Ammunition to the defense buildings so they can actually work.
No Gas Ammunition is provided. Make an ammunition depot in the surroundings to provide Gas Ammunition to this building.
Providing Gas Ammunition to the defense buildings so they can actually work.
No Bombs Ammunition is provided. Make an ammunition depot in the surroundings to provide Bombs Ammunition to this building.
Providing Bombs Ammunition to the defense buildings so they can actually work.
Centralised depot for Shell Ammunition to provide the ammunition to the defense buildings to make sure they can actually shoot.
Centralised depot for Gas Ammunition to provide the ammunition to the defense buildings to make sure they can actually shoot.
Centralised depot for Bombs Ammunitions to provide the ammunition to the defense buildings to make sure they can actually shoot.
Centralised depot for Ammunitions to provide the ammunition to the defense buildings to make sure they can actually shoot.
Recipe for the Ammunition depot processing Basic Ammunition, Shells, Gas and Bombs.
Recipe for the Basic Ammunition Depot processing basic ammunition.
Recipe for the Shell Ammunition Depot processng Shell Ammunition.
Recipe for the Gas Ammunition depot processing Gas Ammunition.
Recipe for the Bombs Ammunition Depot processing Bombs Ammunition.
Collects dung from the surrounding forests, or if you build it next to animal farms it collects dung from there.
Farm building that produces saltpetre from saltpetre beds that processes wood and dung.
Factory that processes Gunpowder, ready to use for ammunition.
Explosive powder used in a variety of ammunitions.
Collects dung from the surrounding animal farms.
Better residences for the Arctic Soldiers.
Outpost in the Arctic functioning as headquarters for Arctic Soldiers.
Outpost in the Arctic functioning as headquarters for Arctic Soldiers.
Outpost in the New World functioning as headquarters for New World Soldiers.
Outpost in Enbesa functioning as headquarters for Enbesa Soldiers.
Outpost in the New World functioning as headquarters for New World Soldiers.
Outpost in Enbesa functioning as headquarters for Enbesa Soldiers.
Military Uniforms that keep the soldiers warm in the cold Arctic.
Producing Heated Military Uniforms from wool, fur and iron.
Residences of the New World Soldiers.
Place where all military personnel gathers to eat in the New World.
Canteen need for all military personnel in the New World
Place where all military personnel gathers to eat Enbesa.
Canteen need for all military personnel in Enbesa.
Open bed where saltpetre is collected after a really nasty process.
Shed that stores the goods for the Nitrary. Without the shed the building can not produce any goods.
Training ground for horses. Module for the stables.
We received news of a military commander in need. We have to go help!
We received news of a military commander in need. We have to go help!
All New Military Character Items reward pool
Build next to an iron mine, copper mine, zinc mine or open pit iron mine. Mining galena for lead.
Smelting Lead into coins to sell off for small profit or pay our military personnel.
Ore mined deep in the mountains.
Coins made from Lead that can be sold to NPCs for a small profit. Your military population also requires them.

Your people should behave or they will be locked up. Reducing the chance of riots, providing extra workforce with the counter of a bit less attractiveness. The people in the prison consume soap, bread and work clothes.

Showing the people the real truth, or maybe skew it a bit. Propaganda? We need to compensate those military costs. Consuming pamphlets that are handed to the people to increase workforce, income and make them "happy" to increase happiness.
Providing free workforce from the prison.
Buffing all military weapons production for extra warefforts.
Producing basic weapons for our military personnel.
Our military personnel needs basic weapons to fight!
Our military personnel needs basic weapons to fight!
Defense buildings near the fort are influenced by this mighty building.
A gigantic defense building placed at the shores.
A gigantic defense building placed at the shores. We will build this step by step.
Strong foundations are crucial for a strong fort that can resist the heaviest attacks.
The lower part of the monument is now up for construction.
Big defense building, build on the coast to protect the island.
Providing All Ammunition to the defense buildings so they can actually work.
There is more in the mines then what we initial look for. We dig deeper for Galena.
We can make care packages with a lot of different goods. Let's see what we can use.
Packages of needed goods to help in hard times.
A package of potatoes, fish, schnapps and work clothes.
Producing packages of potatoes, fish, schnapps and work clothes.
A package of all kinds of meat.
Producing packages of all kinds of meat.
A package of all kinds of fruit.
A package of all kinds of entertainment.
A package of all kinds of fish.
A package of all kinds of sweets.
Producing packages of all kinds of fruit.
Producing packages of all kinds of entertainment.
Producing packages of all kinds of fish.
Producing packages of all kinds of sweets.
Producing packages of all kinds of vegetables.
A package of all kinds of vegetables.
A package of all kinds of drinks.
Producing packages of all kinds of drinks.
Collecting all post, managed by the military.
Making sure your soldiers are staying healthy and have some basic hygiene. Collecting poo.
Making sure your soldiers are staying healthy and have some basic hygiene. Collecting poo.
Recruit naval personnel to use as resource to build ships.
Arms dealer with a variety of products.
The most beautiful windows are made by Theodore. He replaces the wood with lead and makes the most astonishing glass in lead windows.
Dedicated to the memory of those who gave their lives to make the world a better place.
The famous cannon used in the battle where the Queen lost here husband.
Griefing is an important process when loved ones pass away. A place where you can go to say goodbye or feel connected to people that passed away.
Local cemetery where people can grief over their passed away relatives.
Cemetery where people can grief over their passed away relatives.
Local set up hospital to care for the wounded soldiers who come back broken from the war.
Without a proper field hospital wounded soldiers have less chance of surviving their wounds. Luckily we can care for them.
All loading buildings are influenced by the mighty fort.
All repairing buildings are influenced by the mighty fort.
Fortify your encampments or city with a basic pallisade wall.
Make a gate in your pallisade wall so you can get into the fortification.
